title: Add Kendall's Tau-b rank and Spearmans rank correlation Stream Evaluators
description:
Streaming Expressions already supports Pearson's product moment correlation.

This ticket adds Kendall's Tau-b rank correlation and Spearmans rank correlation Stream Evaluators.

Functions are backed by Apache Commons Math
